body: Is this the sequel of the first one? MC is the same guy?
it's an incel's digital wet-dream
They really should seperate netori and netorere, that way discerning between the two of them is way easier
girls like these are wasted on dudes like them, good then
bruh, another girls who was broken and turns in real bitch whores, to these guys better be without them

@ryushiki netori is basically just where the protagonist (other wise could be stated the character you are intended to side with) steals someone while ntr is when the protagonist is stolen (other wise could be stated a story where you are intended to feel bad)

Redo of Healer but this time it's a government conspiracy/dystopia power trip instead of an isekai power trip. At bare minimum it's more interesting than your typical NTR premise, and the art's hot too.
Ntr where people deserve it really hits different. Is that what netori is or is netori when protagonist steals someone else?
Netori really isn't ntr. Stuff like this is why even when you block the ntr tag you gotta stop in and see what is actually ntr and what isn't.

Ah yeah, the author said the protagonist become a hardworking protagonist, lol. It's kinda true since he kinda went out his way using his authority to make the girls happy despite he can just do whatever shit he wanted to like in the first chapter, hahaha

Whoa... I got mixed feeling about the first chapter but this chapter paid off. Not to mention that double sex panel was unique as well. Unlike the first girl, these two used the opportunity they got and not only because it's the law. Also, MC might acted like an asshole, but as it's seen in both this and first chapter, at least he tried to make the girls happy and try to look as he cares about them. He wanted to conquer both heart and body which is something that at least should be appreciated. Oh man, I want the next chapter already.
Revenge NTR,we don't usually see this type of NTR but damn,this is the only NTR that's good (to me atleast)
This guy is living the life I wish I was bullied and the government made a system like that too and get chosen as a high ranking person
damn?!
I approved of this NTR....sweet revenge

LMAO I like how the author says the bangs girl might actually be stupid and the actual airhead might’ve been better if someone with a heart asked her out. But tbh it might’ve been for the best she didn’t because then she wouldn’t be so happy taking the protag’s dick.  Possibly. Shame the first girl didn’t show up though
If our president do that too Imma lick his ass forever just to make me a high ranking citizen
